content: Zhejiang Rehone Plastic Co., Ltd. locates in Tiantai Zhejiang. Established with a registered capital of 10 million yuan, Rehone is a professional and experienced manufacturer of PVB Resin and PVB Interlayer for glass lamination. The company has two bases of production, Wenzhou chemical centre as PVB Resin production base, and Tiantai plant as PVB Interlayer production base. The PVB Interlayer production lines in Tiantai are equipped with advanced machines like EDI Extrusion Dies and SCANTECH gauging system.
